ing: 1 (7 ounce) can Mexican salsa (such as HerdezÂ®), drained
freshly ground black pepper to taste
des: "A delicious Southwestern-style under-skin rub for a smoky and delicious turkey that's not your average bird."
ins: Mash drained salsa and butter together in a bowl. Mix in garlic, orange juice, orange zest, thyme, salt, liquid smoke, and pepper.
